1370: Alretieren was born in Mooierstraet in 1370.
Got married to Lotijn at age 17 in 1370.
Gave birth to Hille in 1370 at age 17.
1390: Died while giving birth to Adam in 1390 at age 37.
1376: Gave birth to Clementia in 1376 at age 23.
1380: Gave birth to Gheuardus in 1380 at age 27.
1382: Gave birth to Syuardus in 1382 at age 29.
1384: Lost son Syuardus when Syuardus was 3 years old.
1386: Gave birth to Ymmekine in 1386 at age 33.
1387: Gave birth to Alem in 1387 at age 34.
1388: Lost son Gheuardus when Gheuardus was 9 years old.
